Detailed Description

Encapsulates an input file for a particular program.

int Countable::decref (  )  [inherited]

RectMatrixPtr gigide::InputFile::getGeometry ( std::vector< std::string > &  atomlist,
std::string  section_name = "geometry" 
)

Get the geometry from a particular section. If the keyword "angstrom" or "bohr" is found in the section, the geometry is assumed to have those units. The geometry is return with the units specified in the "bond units" keyword.

Parameters:
atomlist Will hold the list of atoms found
section_name 
Returns:
The XYZ coordinates

boost::intrusive_ptr<KeywordIterator> gigide::InputFile::getKeywords ( std::string  section_name  ) 

Gets a keyword iterator for a particular section. This current assumes that sections appear as
$section_name
keyname = keyval
...
$end

Parameters:
section_name Currently case-sensitive
Returns:
A keyword iterator for all of the input. Iterator is empty if section does not exist.

std::string gigide::InputFile::getSection ( std::string  section_name  ) 

Returns the text of a section. Does not include opening and closing $tags. See getKeywords.

Parameters:
section_name Case-sensitive
Returns:
The text of the section. Empty string if section does not exist.
